RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1405531913: "Outstanding consistency checks for LTE after PICr18"
2. 1405442134: "FWD (PCR) Provide option to expose the VISA ID as a top level port (VISA ID is currently defined through a parameter only)"
3. 1406280531: "LTE consistency check error on non-unique PID validation - not gated with MI port unused"
4. 1805282179: "RTL Uniquification issue in PICr20"
5. 1406205848: "[TGP-LP] Clamp-1 UPF file for VNN IPs"
6. 1406203169: "IG description of MinGlobalSpacePID parameter not consistent with actual implementation"

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2017WW29" version of SVC in IRR with constraints on hierarchical headers insertion.

For support file an HSD at SIP HSD

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at Zircon Scores
